form.PN:
pri prvih treh pomenih besedo izgovarjamo
/r*@*U/
, pri 4. in 5. pa
/r*a*U/
.

sense.def:
A row
je več stvari ali oseb, razvrščenih v zaporedje.

seg.quote: ...a large hall filled with rows of desks.
They were standing neatly in a row.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi večkrat
in a row
, se zgodi tolikokrat brez prekinitve.

seg.quote: He was elected president three times in a row.

sense.def:
To row a boat
pomeni z vesli premikati čoln po vodi.

seg.quote: We rowed slowly towards the centre of the river.

sense.def:
A row
je spor ali hrupno razpravljanje.

seg.quote: They were always having terrible rows.

sense.def:
To make a row
pomeni povzročati hrup.
